attributes.action: Give all British amphibian species the same protection as great crested newt (Triturus cristatus)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Great crested newt receive full protection under Schedule 5 of the Wildlife and Countryside Act. No other native amphibian is afforded this protection but the loss of a breeding pond is detrimental to all amphibian species. Please amend this legislation before all amphibians become as rare as the great crested newt.
